parameters.gdp: GDP per capita, PPP in constant 2017 international dollars.
parameters.access_elec: Access to electricity as a percentage of the population.
parameters.gni: GNI per capita, PPP in constant 2017 international dollars.
parameters.co2_kg_ppp: kg per 2017 PPP dollars of GDP.
parameters.startup: cost of business startup procedures as a percent of GNI.

title: Sustainability and Economic Indicators for South Africa.
description:
Description
Includes yearly data on gdp, gni, co2 emissions, start up costs.
